caption: Ruby found his uncle by the seaside. Through conversation, she learned that in their family, only women who encounter seawater will become the kraken, and she also had a grandmother who lived in the ocean. Ruby was curious about the underwater world and decided to search for her grandmother. She jumped into the sea and became a kraken. She was excited and explored everywhere. With her uncle's guidance, she finally arrived at the krakenâ€™s kingdom. It was a large castle. Ruby met her grandmother and many other krakens in it. In fact, her grandmother was the queen of the krakens and She hoped Ruby could become her inheritor.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
